ValidationRule.description: PGi requires all leads to have either a phone number or an email address
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISBLANK(Email), ISBLANK(Phone), ISNEW(), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All Leads require you to input either a phone number or email address.
